name: surveys-api
description: SurveysAPI is a JSON REST API for creating, modifying, and submitting surveys. A survey is an ordered list of survey questions. Supported types of questions include: - Text Entry (free form) (ex: "What is your name") - Multiple Choice (ex: "Which color do you like the best? Choose one: [Orange, Green, Blue, Red]") - Date (ex: "What is your birthdate?")
